eu.fbk.dh.kd.lib

Class KD_configuration

  • java.lang.Object
    • eu.fbk.dh.kd.lib.KD_configuration

  • public class KD_configuration
extends Object
    This class represents the configuration object used by the KD Core
    Author:
    Giovanni Moretti - DH Group FBK.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  KD_configuration.ColumExtraction
      Enum Type that setups the columns configuration in the input file.
      static class  KD_configuration.Group
      Enum Type that setups the lemmatization approach of the tool (Experimental).
      static class  KD_configuration.Prefer_Specific_Concept
      Enum Type that gives more relevance to specific(longer) key-phrases.
      static class  KD_configuration.Tagset
      Enum Type that setups the tagset used in the preprocessed file.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      boolean boost_acronyms
      boost acronyms in scientific articles (defalut false)
      boolean capitalize_pos
      capitalize the pos contained in the configuration file.
      KD_configuration.ColumExtraction column_configuration
      Parameter use by the KD core to choose the column configuration of the file Default is TOKEN_POS_LEMMA
      boolean force_abstract
      Force to include in the results the multi-words with an abstract concept inside
      KD_configuration.Group group_by
      Configuration variables used by KD
      String languagePackPath
      Specify the custom language folder path.
      Integer lemma_position
      specify the lemma column position (in case of CUSTOM ColumExtraction option)
      Integer local_frequency_threshold
      The frequency threshold for multiword recognition at document level: a multiword can (but is not necessarily) recognized in a text, if it occurs in a reference corpus at least the number of times specified by this option.
      Integer max_keyword_length
      Max keyword length allowed during the extraction process.
      boolean no_abstract
      Do not use any boost for any abstract concept suffix
      boolean no_idf
      Do not use any kind of IDF information (even if the domain corpus, or docset corpus options are specified]
      boolean no_rerank
      Disables the re-ranking of key-concepts based on their first occurrence in the text.
      boolean no_syn
      KD does not tries to recognize any synonymous phrases specified in the synonyms list.
      Integer numberOfConcepts
      Number of keyconcepts to be retrieved by the KD Core By default is set to -1 that implies the extraction of all keyconcepts present in the ranked list.
      boolean only_multiword
      If you use this option, the tool extracts only the multi-word (multi-token) concept.
      Integer pos_position
      specify the pos column position (in case of CUSTOM ColumExtraction option)
      KD_configuration.Prefer_Specific_Concept prefer_specific_concept
      This option tunes the re-ranking mechanism that tends to raise the position of more specific (longer) key-concepts.
      boolean rerank_by_position
      If you use this option, KD will re-rank key-concepts by raising concepts that appear early in the text.
      boolean skip_keyword_with_not_allowed_words
      If you use this option, the tool discards the key-concepts with inside an item contained in the keyconcept-no file.
      boolean skip_keyword_with_proper_noun
      If you use this option, the tool discards the key-concepts with inside proper noun identified by the part of speech.
      boolean skip_proper_noun
      If you use this option, the tool discards the proper noun identified by the part of speech.
      boolean skipFrequencyAbsorption
      Disables or enables the frequency re-computation on shorter/longer key-phrases.
      KD_configuration.Tagset tagset
      Parameter use by the KD core to choose the pos tagger tagset.
      Integer token_position
      specify the token column position (in case of CUSTOM ColumExtraction option)
      boolean use_pattern_weight
      use weight of pattern (default false)
      boolean verbose
      Disables or enables the verbose mode.

    • Field Detail

      • max_keyword_length

        public Integer max_keyword_length
        Max keyword length allowed during the extraction process. By default is set to 4

      • numberOfConcepts

        public Integer numberOfConcepts
        Number of keyconcepts to be retrieved by the KD Core By default is set to -1 that implies the extraction of all keyconcepts present in the ranked list.

      • local_frequency_threshold

        public Integer local_frequency_threshold
        The frequency threshold for multiword recognition at document level: a multiword can (but is not necessarily) recognized in a text, if it occurs in a reference corpus at least the number of times specified by this option. In other words is the threshold under which the keyconcept are discarded. By default is set to 2.

      • prefer_specific_concept

        public KD_configuration.Prefer_Specific_Concept prefer_specific_concept
        This option tunes the re-ranking mechanism that tends to raise the position of more specific (longer) key-concepts. The option has 5 possible values: no, weak, medium, strong, max (No By default)

      • rerank_by_position

        public boolean rerank_by_position
        If you use this option, KD will re-rank key-concepts by raising concepts that appear early in the text. (default true)

      • group_by

        public KD_configuration.Group group_by
        Configuration variables used by KD

      • skip_proper_noun

        public boolean skip_proper_noun
        If you use this option, the tool discards the proper noun identified by the part of speech. The part of speech of the proper noun can be specified in the properNounPosList file.

      • skip_keyword_with_proper_noun

        public boolean skip_keyword_with_proper_noun
        If you use this option, the tool discards the key-concepts with inside proper noun identified by the part of speech. The part of speech of the proper noun can be specified in the properNounPosList file.

      • skip_keyword_with_not_allowed_words

        public boolean skip_keyword_with_not_allowed_words
        If you use this option, the tool discards the key-concepts with inside an item contained in the keyconcept-no file.

      • column_configuration

        public KD_configuration.ColumExtraction column_configuration
        Parameter use by the KD core to choose the column configuration of the file Default is TOKEN_POS_LEMMA

      • only_multiword

        public boolean only_multiword
        If you use this option, the tool extracts only the multi-word (multi-token) concept.

      • no_syn

        public boolean no_syn
        KD does not tries to recognize any synonymous phrases specified in the synonyms list.

      • no_rerank

        public boolean no_rerank
        Disables the re-ranking of key-concepts based on their first occurrence in the text.

      • skipFrequencyAbsorption

        public boolean skipFrequencyAbsorption
        Disables or enables the frequency re-computation on shorter/longer key-phrases.

      • verbose

        public boolean verbose
        Disables or enables the verbose mode.(Disable by default)

      • no_idf

        public boolean no_idf
        Do not use any kind of IDF information (even if the domain corpus, or docset corpus options are specified]

      • no_abstract

        public boolean no_abstract
        Do not use any boost for any abstract concept suffix

      • force_abstract

        public boolean force_abstract
        Force to include in the results the multi-words with an abstract concept inside

      • token_position

        public Integer token_position
        specify the token column position (in case of CUSTOM ColumExtraction option)

      • lemma_position

        public Integer lemma_position
        specify the lemma column position (in case of CUSTOM ColumExtraction option)

      • pos_position

        public Integer pos_position
        specify the pos column position (in case of CUSTOM ColumExtraction option)

      • languagePackPath

        public String languagePackPath
        Specify the custom language folder path. If it is not specified the current working directory is taken by default.

      • use_pattern_weight

        public boolean use_pattern_weight
        use weight of pattern (default false)

      • capitalize_pos

        public boolean capitalize_pos
        capitalize the pos contained in the configuration file.

      • boost_acronyms

        public boolean boost_acronyms
        boost acronyms in scientific articles (defalut false)

      • tagset

        public KD_configuration.Tagset tagset
        Parameter use by the KD core to choose the pos tagger tagset. Default is TEXTPRO.

      • KD_configuration

        public KD_configuration()

        a String object.
